Description: Elite Form. For 10..70 seconds, you have +100 Health, you are unaffected by Conditions, and your attacks deal earth damage. This Skill is disabled for 120 seconds.

Name: Balthazar's Rage
Description: Enchantment Spell.  All adjacent foes take 15..60 holy damage. For 20 seconds, this Enchantment does nothing. When this Enchantment ends, you gain 4..10 Health for each successful hit while under the effects of this Enchantment.

Name: Banishing Strike
Description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5..20 damage. If it hits a summoned creature, all nearby foes take 10..85 holy damage.

Name: Eremite's Zeal
Description: Spell. Lose 1 Enchantment. You gain 1..6 Energy for each adjacent foe (maximum 15 Energy).

Name: Extend Enchantments
Description: Enchantment Spell. Lose all Enchantments. For 5..20 seconds, Enchantments cast upon you last 100% longer. When this Enchantment ends, you lose all Enchantments on you.

Name: Faithful Intervention
Description: Enchantment Spell. If damage drops your Health below 50%, Faithful Intervention ends. When Faithful Intervention ends, you are healed for 30..150 Health.

Name: Heart of Fury
Description: Enchantment Spell.  For 5..20 seconds, you attack 33% faster. When this Enchantment ends, all nearby foes are set on fire for 1..3 seconds.

Name: Heart of Holy Flame
Description: Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes take 15..60 holy damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal holy damage. When this Enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are set on fire for 1..4 seconds.

Name: Imbue Health
Description: Spell. Target other ally is healed for 5..50% of your current Health (maximum 300 Health).

Name: Intimidating Aura
Description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you strike a foe who has less Health than you, that foe loses 1 Enchantment and Intimidating Aura ends.

Name: Meditation
Description: Spell. Lose 1 Enchantment. If an Enchantment is removed in this way, you gain 3..8 Energy, otherwise you are healed for 20..125 Health.

Name: Mystic Corruption
Description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, Conditions you apply last 1..15% longer for each Enchantment on you (maximum 50%).

Name: Mystic Sweep
Description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5..10 damage for each Enchantment on you (maximum 30 bonus damage).

Name: Mystic Vigor
Description: Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, every time you successfully hit with an attack, you gain 1..7 Health for each Enchantment on you (maximum 25 Health).

Name: Pious Fury
Description: Stance. Lose one Enchantment. For 2..6 seconds, you attack 33% faster.

Name: Pious Haste
Description: Stance. For 3..12 seconds you move 33% faster. When this Stance ends, you lose one Enchantment.

Name: Pious Renewal
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, whenever an Enchantment ends on you, you gain 0..2 Energy and 0..10 Health.

Name: Rending Touch
Description: Spell. You and target touched foe lose 1 Enchantment.

Name: Vow of Silence
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5..10 seconds, you cannot be the target of Spells, and you cannot cast Spells.

Name: Watchful Intervention
Description: Enchantment Spell.  For 60 seconds, the next time target ally's Health drops below 25%, that ally is healed for 50..200 Health.

Name: Zealous Renewal
Description: Enchantment Spell. All adjacent foes take 15..60 holy damage. For 20 seconds, this Enchantment does nothing. When this Enchantment ends, you gain 1 Energy for each successful hit while under the effects of this Enchantment.
